item.title: CVE-2024-34413|2024-05-06T20:14:21.805Z -- SliceWP -- SliceWP
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SliceWP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SliceWP: from n/a through 1.1.10.
